column4: heya, anyone have a swap file size recomendation for a 1.5gb ram netbook (aspire one)? just upgraded from 512mb today
well thats what id do on a normal comp, but as its ssd (8gb) not sure if thats an overkill
At least as much swap as ram if you are planning on suspending the laptop to disk (hibernation)
You shouldn't need to increase swap at all if you don't plan on hibernating.
